details.title: Comments on 'Constrained total least-squares localisation algorithm using time difference of arrival and frequency difference of arrival measurements with sensor location uncertainties'

kwd: constrained total least squares localisation algorithm

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. & Inf. Eng., Naval Aeronaut. & Astronaut. Univ., Yantai, China
authors.name: Fuyong Qu

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron. & Inf. Eng., Naval Aeronaut. & Astronaut. Univ., Yantai, China
authors.name: Xiangwei Meng

details.abstract: In a recent study, Yu et al., a constrained total least-squares algorithm to estimate the position and velocity of a moving source with sensor location uncertainties was proposed. However, two errors appeared in this study. In the comments, the two errors are discussed and some corrections are presented.
